solution:
```python
N, D = map(int, input().split())
d = list(map(int, input().split()))
Q = int(input())
q = list(map(int, input().split()))

def solve():
    dist = D
    for x in d:
        dist = max(0, dist - x)
    return dist > 0

for i in range(Q):
    original_val = d[q[i]-1]
    feasible = False
    for j in range(1,1001):
        d[q[i]-1] = j
        if solve():
            feasible = True
            break
    d[q[i]-1] = original_val
    
    if feasible:
        print("YES")
    else:
        print("NO")

```
